title: Needs-Based Programming Fundamentals Mastery Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and simple logical reasoning proficiency
context.additional_context: Providing in-service elementary school teachers with experiences solving daily work problems through programming

learning_goals: Learners can analyze problem situations arising in daily work and identify required programming concepts with 80% accuracy
Learners can write at least three codes solving real-world problems using core programming elements (variables, conditionals, loops)
Learners can participate 100% in peer review processes by explaining their code to peers and exchanging feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
